articles.title: Cricket-White-ball juggernaut England redefining test cricket too - Reuters
articles.description: England won the T20 World Cup in Australia to firmly establish themselves as the best white-ball team of the era and set out to revolutionise test cricket with an equally bold approach to the longest format of the game.
articles.content: NEW DELHI, Dec 15 (Reuters) - England won the T20 World Cup in Australia to firmly establish themselves as the best white-ball team of the era and set out to revolutionise test cricket with an equall… [+3512 chars]

articles.title: ICC rates Gabba pitch 'below average' after two-day test - Reuters
articles.description: Brisbane's Gabba cricket ground has received one demerit point after the International Cricket Council (ICC) on Tuesday rated the pitch for the first test between Australia and South Africa - which ended in two days - "below average".
articles.content: Dec 20 (Reuters) - Brisbane's Gabba cricket ground has received one demerit point after the International Cricket Council (ICC) on Tuesday rated the pitch for the first test between Australia and Sou… [+1027 chars]
